title: The Sunshine state
brief_description: The agriculture, industries and tourist attractions of Queensland. Brisbane, Townsville and Cairns with their ports and industries; cattle grazing; banana harvesting; cane-cutting; the Barrier Reef with its chain of islands and underwater spectacle; a bird sanctuary; the beaches, hotels and nightlife of the Gold Coast and Surfers paradise. Narrated by Brian Henderson.
